languages.text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit by double-clicking [LMB] on it. To use a medikit, select its icon at the bottom of the screen, then click [LMB] on the character who requires treatment or their portrait. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Once used, medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.
languages.original_text: Используйте {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплект{/g}, чтобы восстановить {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} членов отряда в бою, исцелить {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранения{/g} или избавиться от некоторых {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}негативных эффектов{/g} (если ранения и такие эффекты есть). Если медкомплект экипирован, в нижней левой части экрана отобразится его иконка (если иконки нет, откройте инвентарь и экипируйте медкомплект двойным кликом [ЛКМ]). Чтобы использовать медкомплект, выберите его иконку внизу экрана, затем кликните [ЛКМ] на персонаже, которому требуется лечение, или на его портрет. Персонаж может использовать медкомплект, только находясь на соседней от цели клетке. Использовать медкомплект может только персонаж со способностью Мастерство медицины. Количество восстановленных очков здоровья зависит от результата проверки навыка Медицина. Каждый медкомплект имеет минимум два заряда — одно использование отнимает один заряд. Использованные медкомплекты будут исчезать с панели внизу экрана — не забывайте регулярно экипировать новые медкомплекты на персонажей. Обратите внимание: как и любое действие, лечение в бою отнимает очки действий.

traits.locale_text:
Вы можете восстанавливать здоровье персонажей в бою с помощью использования Medikit.
Для этого откройте инвентарь и разместите Medikit в слоте активного предмета.
Во время боя нажмите на Medikit на панели в нижней части экрана и выберите персонажа, на которого хотите его применить.
При использовании Medikit происходит проверка вашего навыка Medicae, от которой зависит *а что у нас тут зависит?*.
Обратите внимание, что лечение тоже расходует AP.

You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an effect). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit by double-clicking [LMB] on it. To use a medikit, select its icon at the bottom of the screen, then click [LMB] on the character who requires treatment or their portrait. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Medicae Training feature. A {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with one charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an effect). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit by double-clicking [LMB] on it. To use a medikit, select its icon at the bottom of the screen, then click [LMB] on the character who requires treatment or their portrait. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Medicae Training feature. A {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with one charge being consumed per use. Used medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit by double-clicking [LMB] on it. To use a medikit, select its icon at the bottom of the screen, then click [LMB] on the character who requires treatment or their portrait. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Once used, medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit by double-clicking [LMB] on it. To use a medikit, select its icon at the bottom of the screen, then click [LMB] on the character who requires treatment or their portrait. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Once used, medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

languages.text: Используйте {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплект{/g}, чтобы восстановить {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} членов отряда в бою, исцелить {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранения{/g} или избавиться от некоторых {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}негативных эффектов{/g} (если ранения и такие эффекты есть). Если медкомплект экипирован, в нижней левой части экрана отобразится его иконка (если иконки нет, откройте инвентарь и экипируйте медкомплект двойным кликом [ЛКМ]). Чтобы использовать медкомплект, выберите его иконку внизу экрана, затем кликните [ЛКМ] на персонаже, которому требуется лечение, или на его портрет. Персонаж может использовать медкомплект, только находясь на соседней от цели клетке. Использовать медкомплект может только персонаж, освоивший Лечение в бою, Базовый навык: Медицина или вложивший хотя бы одно очко в развитие навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}медицина{/g} при повышении уровня. Количество восстановленного здоровья зависит от результата проверки навыка Медицина. Каждый медкомплект имеет минимум два заряда — одно использование отнимает один заряд. Использованные медкомплекты будут исчезать с панели внизу экрана — не забывайте регулярно экипировать новые медкомплекты на персонажей. Обратите внимание: как и любое действие, лечение в бою отнимает очки действий.
languages.original_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit by double-clicking [LMB] on it. To use a medikit, select its icon at the bottom of the screen, then click [LMB] on the character who requires treatment or their portrait. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Once used, medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

languages.text: 在战斗中，您可以使用{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}为同伴恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，治疗{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}，或解除某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}（例如角色受伤，或受到部分负面{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}影响）。如果角色装备了医疗包，医疗包的图标会在左下角显示。如果没有显示图标，请打开物品栏，双击鼠标左键装备医疗包。若要使用医疗包，请选择屏幕底部的图标，之后鼠标左键点击需要治疗的角色，或者左键单击角色头像。角色只能对相邻的目标使用医疗包。 只有拥有野战医疗特性，或拥有基础技能：医疗，或至少进阶过{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}技能一次的角色，才能使用医疗包。使用医疗包时会进行{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，决定回复的生命值数量。 每个医疗包都可以至少使用2次，每次使用消耗1次使用次数。已经使用过的医疗包会从屏幕下方的面板中消失。因此，别忘了定期为角色配备新的医疗包。 请注意，在战斗中使用医疗包与绝大多数行动一样，都会消耗角色的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit by double-clicking [LMB] on it. To use a medikit, select its icon at the bottom of the screen, then click [LMB] on the character who requires treatment or their portrait. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Once used, medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: 在战斗中，您可以使用{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}为同伴恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，治疗{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}，或解除某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}（例如角色受伤，或受到部分负面{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}影响）。如果角色装备了医疗包，医疗包的图标会在左下角显示。如果没有显示图标，请打开物品栏，双击鼠标左键装备医疗包。若要使用医疗包，请选择屏幕底部的图标，之后鼠标左键点击需要治疗的角色，或者左键单击角色头像。角色只能对相邻的目标使用医疗包。 只有拥有医疗训练特性的角色，才能使用医疗包。使用医疗包时会进行{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，决定回复的生命值数量。 每个医疗包都可以至少使用2次，每次使用消耗1次使用次数。已经使用过的医疗包会从屏幕下方的面板中消失。因此，别忘了定期为角色配备新的医疗包。 请注意，在战斗中使用医疗包与绝大多数行动一样，都会消耗角色的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text: {g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}を使用すると、戦闘中に部隊メンバーの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}の回復、{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}傷{/g}の治療、特定の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}マイナス効果{/g}の解除ができる（キャラクターが負傷中の場合や、対象{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を受けている場合）。キャラクターがメディキットを装備していると、アイコンが左下に表示される。アイコンが表示されていない場合は、インベントリを開き[LMB]をダブルクリックすると装備できる。メディキットを使用するには、画面下のアイコンを選択し、治療が必要なキャラクターか対象キャラのプロフィール画像の上で[LMB]をクリックする。メディキットは、隣接しているキャラクターにしか使用できない。 メディキットを使えるのは、戦場衛生兵か基本スキル：メディケアを持つキャラクター、または{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}スキルを最低1度向上させたキャラクターのみ。{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}結果で回復する負傷耐性の量が決まる。 各メディキットにはチャージ数が2個以上あり、1回の使用で1チャージ消費される。一度使用したメディキットは画面下のパネルから消えるので、定期的に新しいメディキットを忘れずキャラクターに装備しよう。 回復は他の行動と同様に、戦闘中にキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}を消費するので注意が必要だ。
languages.original_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit by double-clicking [LMB] on it. To use a medikit, select its icon at the bottom of the screen, then click [LMB] on the character who requires treatment or their portrait. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Once used, medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}を使用すると、戦闘中にパーティーメンバーの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を回復したり、{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}怪我{/g}を治療したり、特定の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}ネガティブ効果{/g}（キャラクターが怪我していたり、それらの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を受けている場合）を無効にしたりできる。キャラクターがメディキットを装備している場合、アイコンが左下に表示される。アイコンが表示されていない場合、インベントリを開き[LMB] をダブルクリックすると装備できる。メディキットを使用するには、画面下のアイコンを選択し、治療が必要なキャラクターまたはそのポートレートの上で [LMB] をクリックする。キャラクターは隣接するターゲットに対してのみメディキットを使用できる。 メディキットは、メディケアトレーニング機能を持つキャラクターのみが使用できる。{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}により、回復する負傷の数が決定する。 各メディキットには2つ以上のチャージがあり、1回の使用で1つのチャージが消費される。使用したメディキットは画面下のパネルから消失するため、定期的に新しいメディキットをキャラクターに装備させるようにしよう。 回復は他のアクションと同様、戦闘中、キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}を消費する。

languages.text: Puedes usar un {g|ib:Medikit}botiquín{/g} para sanar las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de los miembros de tu equipo, tratar una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} o deshacerte de ciertos {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efectos negativos{/g} (si el personaje sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de ese tipo). Si el personaje tiene equipado un botiquín, se mostrará su icono en la parte inferior izquierda. En caso de que no aparezca dicho icono, abre el inventario y equipa un botiquín haciendo doble clic con el [botón izquierdo del ratón] en él. Para usar un botiquín, selecciona su icono en la parte inferior de la pantalla y luego pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre el personaje que lo necesite o en su retrato. Los personajes solo pueden usar botiquines sobre un objetivo adyacente. Solo los personajes con la aptitud Médico de combate, la habilidad básica: Medicae o los que hayan avanzado la habilidad {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} al menos una vez pueden usar botiquines. Una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} determina la cantidad de heridas que restaura. Cada botiquín tiene 2 o más cargas y consume 1 por uso. Una vez agotado, desaparecerá del panel de la parte inferior de la pantalla, así que recuerda equipar nuevos botiquines con frecuencia. No olvides que curar, como la mayoría de acciones, cuesta {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} en combate.
languages.original_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit by double-clicking [LMB] on it. To use a medikit, select its icon at the bottom of the screen, then click [LMB] on the character who requires treatment or their portrait. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Once used, medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Puedes usar un {g|ib:Medikit}botiquín{/g} para sanar las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de los miembros de tu equipo, tratar una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} o deshacerte de ciertos {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efectos negativos{/g} (si el personaje sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de tal tipo). Si el personaje tiene equipado un botiquín, se mostrará su icono en la parte inferior izquierda. En caso de que no aparezca dicho icono, abre el inventario y equipa un botiquín haciendo doble clic con el [botón izquierdo del ratón] en él. Para usar un botiquín, selecciona su icono en la parte inferior de la pantalla y luego pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre el personaje que lo necesite o en su retrato. Los personajes solo pueden usar botiquines en objetivos próximos. Solo los personajes con la característica Entrenamiento medicae pueden hacer uso de los botiquines. El número de heridas que se restaurarán viene dado por una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}medicae{/g}. Cada botiquín dispone de 2 o más cargas y se consume una con cada uso. Al usar un botiquín, desaparecerá del panel de la parte inferior de la pantalla, así que recuerda equipar nuevos botiquines a tus personajes continuamente. Ten en cuenta que la curación, así como la mayoría de las acciones, consumen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} del personaje en combate.

languages.text: Mit einem {g|ib:Medikit}Medikit{/g} kannst du die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} deiner Gruppenmitglieder im Kampf wiederherstellen, eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} behandeln oder bestimmte {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative Effekte{/g} loswerden (wenn der Charakter verletzt ist oder von einem solchen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} beeinflusst wird). Wenn die Spielfigur ein Medikit hat, wird das Symbol unten links angezeigt. Wenn kein solches Symbol vorhanden ist, öffne dein Inventar und rüste ein Medikit aus, indem du mit der [LMB] darauf doppelklickst. Zur Benutzung eines Medikits wählst du sein Symbol unten auf dem Bildschirm aus und klickst dann mit der [LMB] auf den Charakter, der behandelt werden muss, oder auf sein Porträt. Ein Charakter kann ein Medikit nur auf ein Ziel anwenden, das sich neben ihm befindet. Medikits können nur von Charakteren verwendet werden, die über das Feature Gefechtssanitäter oder die Grundfertigkeit: Medicae verfügen oder mindestens einmal {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}-Fertigkeitsfortschritt verwendet haben. Eine {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeits{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} bestimmt über die Anzahl der wiederhergestellten Wunden. Jedes Medikit kann 2 oder mehr Ladungen enthalten, wobei pro Benutzung 1 Ladung verbraucht wird. Wenn sie aufgebraucht sind, verschwinden die Medikits aus der Leiste am unteren Bildschirmrand, also rüste deine Charaktere regelmäßig mit neuen Medikits aus. Beachte, dass die Heilung, genau wie die meisten anderen Aktionen, die {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} des Charakters im Kampf verbraucht.
languages.original_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit by double-clicking [LMB] on it. To use a medikit, select its icon at the bottom of the screen, then click [LMB] on the character who requires treatment or their portrait. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Once used, medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Mit einem {g|ib:Medikit}Medikit{/g} kannst du die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} deiner Gruppenmitglieder im Kampf wiederherstellen, eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} behandeln oder bestimmte {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative Effekte{/g} loswerden (wenn der Charakter verletzt ist oder von einem solchen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} beeinflusst wird). Wenn die Spielfigur ein Medikit hat, wird das Symbol unten links angezeigt. Wenn kein solches Symbol vorhanden ist, öffne dein Inventar und rüste ein Medikit aus, indem du mit der [LMB] darauf doppelklickst. Zur Benutzung eines Medikits wählst du sein Symbol unten auf dem Bildschirm aus und klickst dann mit der [LMB] auf den Charakter, der behandelt werden muss, oder aber auf sein Porträt. Ein Charakter kann ein Medikit nur auf ein Ziel anwenden, das sich neben ihm befindet. Medikits können nur von Charakteren verwendet werden, die über die Medicae-Ausbildung verfügen. Eine {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeits-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} bestimmt die Anzahl der wiederhergestellten Wunden. Jedes Medikit kann 2 oder mehr Ladungen enthalten, wobei pro Benutzung eine Ladung verbraucht wird. Wenn sie aufgebraucht sind, verschwinden die Medikits aus der Leiste am unteren Bildschirmrand, also rüste deine Charaktere regelmäßig mit neuen Medikits aus. Beachte, dass die Heilung, genau wie die meisten anderen Aktionen, die {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} des Charakters im Kampf verbraucht.

languages.text: Vous pouvez utiliser un {g|ib:Medikit}médikit{/g} pour restaurer la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} des membres de votre groupe au combat, soigner une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion{/g} ou neutraliser certains {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effets négatifs{/g} (si le personnage est blessé ou sous le coup d'un tel {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g}). Si le personnage est équipé d'un médikit, son icône s'affiche en bas à gauche. Si cette icône n'est pas présente, ouvrez votre inventaire et équipez-le d'un médikit en double-cliquant dessus avec le [LMB]. Pour utiliser un médikit, sélectionnez son icône en bas de l'écran, puis cliquez avec le [LMB] sur le personnage qui a besoin d'être soigné ou son portrait. Un personnage ne peut utiliser un médikit que sur une cible adjacente à sa position. Les médikits ne peuvent être utilisés que par les personnages possédant la caractéristique Médic de Terrain, la compétence de base : Medicae ou ayant reçu au moins une amélioration de la compétence {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} détermine le nombre de blessures soignées. Chaque médikit contient un minimum de 2 charges et 1 charge est consommée par utilisation. Une fois utilisés, les médikits disparaissent du panneau situé en bas de l'écran. Aussi, pensez à équiper régulièrement vos personnages de nouveaux médikits. Notez qu'en situation de combat, les soins, comme la plupart des actions, coûtent au personnage des {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g}.
languages.original_text: You can use a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} to restore your party members' {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in battle, treat an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}, or get rid of certain {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effects{/g} (if the character is injured or afflicted with such an {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}). If the character has a medikit equipped, its icon will be displayed on the bottom left. If no such icon is present, open your inventory and equip a medikit by double-clicking [LMB] on it. To use a medikit, select its icon at the bottom of the screen, then click [LMB] on the character who requires treatment or their portrait. A character can only use a medikit on a target they are adjacent to. Medikits can only be used by characters who have the Field Medic feature, Base Skill: Medicae, or have taken {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill advancement at least once. A {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} determines the number of wounds restored. Each medikit holds 2 or more charges, with 1 charge being consumed per use. Once used, medikits disappear from the panel on the bottom of the screen, so remember to equip your characters with new medikits regularly. Note that healing, just like most actions, spends the character's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} in combat.

Chaque médikit contient un minimum de 2 charges et une charge est consommée par utilisation. Une fois utilisés, les médikits disparaissent du panneau situé en bas de l'écran. Aussi, pensez à équiper régulièrement vos personnages de nouveaux médikits.
